{"Table": true}
-- gfm198.md --
| foo | bar |
| --- | --- |
| baz | bim |
-- gfm198.html --
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>foo</th>
<th>bar</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>baz</td>
<td>bim</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
-- gfm199.md --
| abc | defghi |
:-: | -----------:
bar | baz
-- gfm199.html --
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th align="center">abc</th>
<th align="right">defghi</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td align="center">bar</td>
<td align="right">baz</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
-- gfm200.md --
| f\|oo  |
| ------ |
| b `\|` az |
| b **\|** im |
-- gfm200.html --
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>f|oo</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>b <code>|</code> az</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>b <strong>|</strong> im</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
-- gfm201.md --
| abc | def |
| --- | --- |
| bar | baz |
> bar
-- gfm201.html --
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>abc</th>
<th>def</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>bar</td>
<td>baz</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<blockquote>
<p>bar</p>
</blockquote>
-- gfm202.md --
| abc | def |
| --- | --- |
| bar | baz |
bar

bar

| -------- | -------- | -------- |
| a        | value1   | value2   |
| b        | value3   | value4   |
-- 3.html --
